sys_properties.description: Instructions: 1) Get your Meetup.com API key from https://secure.meetup.com/meetup_api/key/ then set the Meetup.API key in the properties. 2) Set the urlname for the local meetup to the local url. Should look somehting like Location-ServiceNow-Developer-Meetup 3) Open the Meetups module and click Sync Events. This will bring in the past and future events. 4) Open the current event and click Sync. This will make the event the current event and bring over the attendees from the Meetup.com server 5) Open the /checkin URL to have your developers checkin
sys_properties.name: x_snc_dev_meet.instructions
